item.title: Intel’s stock is on a five-day hot streak — but it’s still below last month’s highs
item.description: Despite excitement over Intel’s new CEO, shares are still below the company’s year-to-date highs — in February, when investors were expecting an immin...

item.title: Your 401(k) may need some all-weather protection
item.description: With retail investors in the grip of stock-market turmoil, a fund that protects against all kinds of financial risks seems like a good idea. Is it?

item.title: ‘They hate our generation’: My son and daughter-in-law want us to sell our house — and move to Oregon to start a commune
item.description: “They have spent thousands of dollars taking month-long earthship-building classes.”

item.title: ‘I’ll retire when I’m dead’: My 401(k) lost $50,000 in the market turmoil. I’m in my early 40s. What should I do now?
item.description: “I have no clue how the funds in my 401(k) are invested.”

item.title: Sarepta’s stock slammed after patient dies of liver failure. Here’s what Wall Street is saying.
item.description: More than 800 people have been treated with Elevidys, the only approved treatment for Duchenne muscular dystrophy, the company said.
